1.0.3.en: Fixed notification not recieved if obstacle is detected

1.0.5.en: Notification is reset only when gate is closed

1.2.0.en: Open/Close by app now set opening/closing and later set final state.

1.4.2.en: Added better timer for app opening/closing states

2.0.0.en: Switched from other device class to garagedoor, so few BC breaks, but Google Home and Homekit should benefit from this greatly

2.0.1.en: Minimal version fix, BC breaks from version <2
